sentences.en: Dozens of supermarket and hypermarket chains are doing brisk business locally, including Carrefour, Metro and RT - Mart.
sentences.cn: 许多连锁超市和大卖场正活跃在当地的业务, 其中包括家乐福 、 麦德龙 和大润 发.

sentences.en: Instead they walk, cycle or take the hypermarket bus service.
sentences.cn: 他们多数人或步行, 或骑自行车,或乘坐超市的班车.

sentences.en: It is natural for the shopkeeper to feel annoyed when the hypermarket is set up close to his shop.
sentences.cn: 当特大超级市场挨着这家商场建立起来时,店主感到苦恼是正常的.

sentences.en: Once the rubble is cleared away, the planis to turn the site into a commercial complex, with an indoor theme park, hugefive-star hotel, hypermarket, and office block.
sentences.cn: 拆掉后，计划是将这个地块变成商业综合体，里面将设立室内主题公园，巨型五星级酒店，大型超市以及办公大楼。

sentences.en: The hypermarket stations had a wide selection of branded foods, clean toilets, friendly service and fast checkouts.
sentences.cn: 这家超大型连锁加油站有各种名牌食品 、 洁净的卫生间 、 友好的服务并且结帐迅速.

sentences.en: The small shopkeepers realized that the hypermarket will take away some of their trade.
sentences.cn: 这些小店主们很清楚那个超级市场将会抢走他们的部分生意.

sentences.en: We are a hypermarket in Tokyo.
sentences.cn: 我们是东京一家大型的超市.
